cast.overview: Everyone deserves a great love story, but for 17-year-old Simon Spier, it's a little more complicated. He hasn't told his family or friends that he's gay, and he doesn't know the identity of the anonymous classmate that he's fallen for online.
cast.title: Love, Simon

cast.overview: When renowned crime novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead at his estate just after his 85th birthday, the inquisitive and debonair Detective Benoit Blanc is mysteriously enlisted to investigate. From Harlan's dysfunctional family to his devoted staff, Blanc sifts through a web of red herrings and self-serving lies to uncover the truth behind Harlan's untimely death.
cast.title: Knives Out

also_known_as: キャサリン・ラングフォード
details.biography:
Katherine Anne Langford (born 29 April 1996) is an Australian actress. After appearing in several independent films, she had her breakthrough starring as Hannah Baker in the Netflix television series 13 Reasons Why (2017–2018), which earned her a Golden Globe Award nomination. She then appeared in the films Love, Simon (2018) and Knives Out (2019) and headlined the dark comedy Spontaneous (2020) and the Netflix series Cursed (2020).

Description above from the Wikipedia article Katherine Langford, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Katherine Langford
